message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200.  I think you'll find it's a great deal for a product of this quality.
Hi Alice, $200 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $125 for it.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer.  I could come down a bit to $180, but $125 is too low for me.
Alice, $180 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $140, which is the absolute highest I can go.  Let's make a deal!
